001package imagingbook.lib.util.bits;
002
003/**
004 * This class implements {@link BitVector} with internal 64-bit 
005 * {@code long} data.
006 * @author WB
007 */
008public class BitVector64 implements BitVector {
009        
010        private static final int WL = 64;
011        
012        private final long[] data;
013        private final int length;
014        
015        public BitVector64(int length) {
016                this.length = length;
017                int n = (length % WL == 0) ? length / WL : length / WL + 1;     // word count
018                this.data = new long[n];
019        }
020        
021        public BitVector64(byte[] bytes) {
022                this(bytes.length);
023                for (int i = 0; i < bytes.length; i++) {
024                        if (bytes[i] != 0) {
025                                this.set(i);
026                        }
027                }
028        }
029        
030        public BitVector64(boolean[] bools) {
031                this(bools.length);
032                for (int i = 0; i < bools.length; i++) {
033                        this.set(i, bools[i]);
034                }
035        }
036        
037        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
038
039        @Override
040        public int getLength() {
041                return this.length;
042        }
043        
044        @Override
045        public boolean get(int i) {
046                if (i < 0 || i >= length) {
047                        throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException("illegal index " + i);
048                }
049                final long mask = 1L << (i % WL);
050                return (data[i / WL] & mask) != 0L;
051        }
052        
053        @Override
054        public void set(int i) {
055                if (i < 0 || i >= length) {
056                        throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException("illegal index " + i);
057                }
058                final int j = i / WL;   // word index
059                final long mask = 1L << (i % WL);
060                data[j] =  data[j] | mask;
061        }
062        
063        @Override
064        public void unset(int i) {
065                if (i < 0 || i >= length) {
066                        throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException("illegal index " + i);
067                }
068                final int j = i / WL;   // word index
069                long mask = 1L << (i % WL);
070                data[j] =  data[j] & ~mask;
071        }
072        
073        @Override
074        public void setAll() {
075                for (int j = 0; j < data.length; j++) {
076                        data[j] = ~0L;
077                }
078        }
079
080        @Override
081        public void unsetAll() {
082                for (int j = 0; j < data.length; j++) {
083                        data[j] = 0L;
084                }
085        }
086                
087        
088        @Override
089        public String toString() {
090                StringBuilder buf = new StringBuilder();
091                buf.append(BitVector64.class.getSimpleName() + "[");
092                for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
093                        buf.append(this.get(i) ? "1" : "0");
094                }
095                buf.append("]");
096                return buf.toString();
097        }
098        
099//      public String toHexString() {
100//              StringBuilder buf = new StringBuilder();
101//              buf.append(BitVector64.class.getSimpleName() + "[");
102//              for (int i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
103//                      buf.append(Long.toHexString(data[i]));
104//              }
105//              buf.append("]");
106//              return buf.toString();
107//      }
108        
109        //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
110        
111        public static void main(String[] args) {
112                int K = 99;
113                BitVector64 b = new BitVector64(K);
114                
115                System.out.println(b.toString());
116                b.setAll();
117                System.out.println(b.toString());
118                b.unsetAll();
119                System.out.println(b.toString());
120                
121//              System.out.println(b.toHexString());
122                
123                System.out.println();
124                
125                for (int i = 0; i < b.length; i++) {
126                        b.set(i);
127                        System.out.println(b.toString());
128                        b.unset(i);
129                }
130        }
131
132}
